description:
You don`t necessarily have to wear rose-colored glasses to get a better view of the world, you just have to wear glasses! At least, that`s the philosophy of http://anidb.net/ch57808 [Souma Akira], a high school student who breaks humanity into three kinds of people: those wear glasses, those who don`t and girls. After all, if two heads are better than one, then four eyes are clearly superior to two, right? And what other modern invention can serve as both medical aid and fashion accessory while keeping the sun out of one`s eyes and making 3D movies 3D? Akira`s focus on eyewear has so framed his thoughts that he`s formed a Glasses Club at Himaraya Third Technical High School and coerced all his glasses-wearing (and ridiculously good looking) friends to join. Fortunately childhood pal http://anidb.net/ch57807 [Yukiya], adoring http://anidb.net/ch57809 [Mitsuki], dreamy http://anidb.net/ch57810 [Takuma] and non-corrective lens wearing http://anidb.net/ch57811 [Hayato] are more than happy to share Akira`s vision of a bespectacled world, even if it sometimes means making a huge spectacle.
Source: Sentai Filmworks
Note: The first episode received an early screening at a special event on 28 September 2013 at Odaiba Cinema Mediage in Tokyo. The regular TV broadcast started on 7 October 2013.

REGULAR.description:
A roar rings out from the roof of Himaraya 3rd Technical High School. The students are in a flurry. Five figures stand before them -- the Glasses Club. Club President Soma Akira directs his question of the student body: "Do you want to see a beautiful woman naked?!" The students erupt in cheers. The Glasses Club is shouldering the burden of great expectations indeed. Just then, behind Akira, there appears...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Megane o Tada no Shiryoku Kyousei Item, Mata Moteitem to Shite de wa Naku (Ryaku) Shite Iru Waga Meganebu
We Don`t Use Glasses Merely As a Vision Correction Tool or a Fashion Accessory (...) That Is Our Glasses Club.
メガネをただの視力矯正アイテム, またモテアイテムとしてではなく(略) している我がメガネ部

REGULAR.description:
Hayato is working feverishly to clean up the club room, which was ruined when X-Ray Glasses Mk. 33 exploded. Amidst the room`s remains, he finds the Glasses Club albums, and gets drawn in by the nostalgia. Just then, he realizes something...
One day after class, the Glasses Club advisor, Shirogane Hotaka, is called to meet Minabe Yukiya in the health room. What does he find there?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Any Man Who Wears Glasses Cannot Be a Bad Man
Megane o Kakete Iru Otoko ni Warui Otoko wa Inai / Nau Saikyou Frame
メガネをかけている漢に悪い漢はいない / なう最強フレーム

REGULAR.description:
The Glasses Club neglects their studies in their busy pursuit of the development of the X-Ray Glasses Mk. 35. They come up with a secret plan to get them to their fun club activities faster: They create 55 minutes clocks, and swap them for the clocks all over the school. What they don`t realize that in a way, this will cut their club activities short, too...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Hope You Finish the X-Ray Glasses
Sukesuke Megane, Kansei Suru to Ii ne
スケスケメガネ, 完成するといいね

REGULAR.description:
Mitsuki stares into the mirror, practicing different ways to get the corners of his mouth to line up with his glasses when he smiles. One particular smile causes a golden light to shine from his face. The ratio of the distance between the corners of his mouth and the distance from the corner of his mouth to his glasses is 1:1.618. Mitsuki overflows with hope as he realizes what he`s done. Morning. The birds sing in the trees. An alarm clock goes off. Takuma rolls out of bed; he`s bent his temple. This is a day in the life of the Suzumine Brothers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kore ga Honmono no Megane nanda yo! / Megane wa Kokoro de Ari Onore Jishin
This Is What It Means to Wear Real Glasses! / Glasses Reflect the Soul and Who You Truly Are
これが本物のメガネなんだよ! / メガネは心であり己自身

REGULAR.description:
The Glasses Club president, Soma Akira, claims that he is not afraid of anything. The club is hard at work developing the X-Ray Glasses once again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Atte mo Date Megane nanka ni Iu Wake Nai / Lens Atte no Chouonpa Senjouki
Even If He Is, He Wouldn`t Tell Some Jerk in Fake Glasses. / It`s an Ultrasonic Cleaner for Glasses with Lenses.
あってもダテメガネなんかに言うわけない / レンズあっての超音波洗浄機

REGULAR.description:
After class, the guys gather in the club room as usual. The president says "I called you here today for one reason only" even though he didn`t actually call them there at all.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: MR
MR
MR

REGULAR.description:
The Glasses Club faces its greatest crisis yet. Because it does not meet the Student Council`s regulation that every club have at least five members, they must recruit a new member by the end of the day or be disbanded. While the rest of the club goes about trying to recruit more members, Yukiya remains focused on the development of the X-Ray Glasses.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Come, Glasses Wearers! Your Glasses Will Change the World!
Kitare! Meganemono! Omae no Megane ga Sekai o Kaeru
来たれ! メガネ者! お前のメガネが世界を変える

REGULAR.description:
One day at lunch, certain people head for the cafeteria. One person opens a homemade lunch box, while another  goes to buy cream puffs. For the Glasses Club it`s the beginning of lunch time as usual... until they find changes to their usual meal routine that deny them each their desired lunch. Just then, Mitsuki spots a suspicious shadow out in the hall...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: As Long As My Glasses Sparkle, You Won`t Get Away With It!
Megane ga Pikkapika na Uchi wa Sou wa Ikemasen
メガネがぴっかぴかなうちはそうはいきません

REGULAR.description:
The 2nd year students are more hyper than ever as they embark on a field trip to Okinawa, while the 1st years (especially Mitsuki) are more depressed than ever as they are left back in the club room. Akira, Takuma, and Yukiya initially avoided diving because it would force them to remove their glasses, but Yukiya uses his yPad to make a special discovery. However, the same revolution that he finds is the beginning of atragedy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Revolution for Glasses Wearers
Meganemono-tachi ni Totte no Kakumei
メガネ者達にとっての革命

REGULAR.description:
Akira brings in a mysterious board game called "Glasses Sugoroku" which he found by the side of the road. The first roll of the dice is the start of a life-or-glasses battle! Shirogane and Hariu are drinking at a bar downtown. Hariu ends up drinking so much he gets cranky. Where does Shirogane take him?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rule-teki ni wa Safe Da ga, Megane-teki ni wa Out / Meganebu no Yatsura o Miteru to Touji no Oretachi o Omoidasu
The Rules Say You`re Safe, But Glasses Say You`re Out / When I Look at the Glasses Club, It Makes Me Think of Us Back Then
ルール的にはセーフだが, メガネ的にはアウト / メガネ部の奴らを見てると当時の俺達を思い出す

REGULAR.description:
Hima High`s culture festival draws near, and the student council`s plan to build a beautiful tower to bring the school more popularity is supported only by the boys of Meganebu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Only Natural That Glasses Wearers Love Glasses
Meganemono nara Megane o Aishite Atarimae Da
メガネ者ならメガネを愛して当たり前だ

REGULAR.description:
Akira and the rest of Meganebu unveil their treasure hunt game at the culture festival. Later the Student Council reveals their grand tower to the world.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Glasses Club!
Meganebu!
メガネブ!

Megane Bu!
Meganebu!
メガネブ!
